verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* evil-doer says \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* heart, \w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* before \w his|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* takes comfort \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w thought|strong="H3820"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* sin \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* uncovered \w and|strong="H0430"\w* hated.

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* words \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mouth \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w evil|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* deceit; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* given \w up|strong="H0413"\w* being wise \w and|strong="H5869"\w* doing good.

\w He|strong="H6310"\w* gives \w thought|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w evil|strong="H0205"\w* \w on|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H6310"\w* bed; \w he|strong="H6310"\w* takes \w a|strong="H1697"\w* \w way|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H2308"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w*; \w he|strong="H6310"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H2308"\w* \w a|strong="H1697"\w* hater \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w evil|strong="H0205"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* mercy, O Lord, \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* strong purpose \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* high \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* clouds.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* righteousness \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mountains \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w your|strong="H3068"\w* judging \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* great deep; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H5704"\w* give life \w to|strong="H5704"\w* man \w and|strong="H3068"\w* beast.

How good \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* loving \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*! \w the|strong="H3068"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* take cover under \w the|strong="H3068"\w* shade \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wings.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* delights \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* house \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* showered \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*; \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* give \w them|strong="H1121"\w* drink \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* river \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* pleasures.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H8248"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H1004"\w* life: \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H8248"\w* light we \w will|strong="H1004"\w* see light.

O let there \w be|strong="H4726"\w* no end \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* loving mercy \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H4726"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w or|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H4726"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* righteousness \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* upright \w in|strong="H7200"\w* heart.

Let \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* foot \w of|strong="H3820"\w* pride come against \w me|strong="H4900"\w*, \w or|strong="H6666"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* evil-doers put \w me|strong="H4900"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* place.

There \w the|strong="H0935"\w* workers \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w evil|strong="H7563"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w down|strong="H3027"\w*: \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* been made low, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w lifted|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w*.
